data.event: Civil War re-enactment planned in Clinton April 4.

event.title: Sunday, April 5, the focus will be

data.event: On Sunday, April 5, the focus will be on the civilian side of the Civil War era.
In addition there will be period childrenâ€™s activities in the circa 1860 Bunker Hill Schoolhouse from noon until 3:30 p.m.
